spell_tooltip.description: Summons a totem with 5% of your health at the target location for 6 sec that forms a circuit of electricity that enemies cannot pass through.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 191,298 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 188,729 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 188,697 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 75,237 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 75,980 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 75,417 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 167,214 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.
Chills the target with frost, causing 112,690 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,283 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 334,600 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 338,067 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 250,950 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at your enemies for 20 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning increases your haste by 4%, stacking up to 4 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 454,581 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.
Your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt has 30% reduced cast time after casting Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Stormkeeper by 2.0 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 10 sec.

Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 8% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Increases the duration of Lightning Rod by 4 sec and its damage bonus by 25%.

After casting Earth Shock, your next Earthquake deals 120% additional damage.

After casting Elemental Blast, your next Earthquake deals 140% additional damage.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 359,202 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.
Every 40 Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent replaces your next Lightning Bolt with Tempest.

Spending Maelstrom Weapon stacks grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 10%.
Tempest increases your movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 35% chance to refund 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.

Tempest causes your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt to be instant cast, deal 40% increased damage, and cast an additional time.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Tempest summons a Nature Feral Spirit for 15 sec.
Crash Lightning and Chain Lightning damage increased by 10%.

Gain the effects of the Lightning Rod talent:

 Lightning Rod
Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 8% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
